### Pre-merge checklist

- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Reviews
  - [ ] Code review
  - [ ] Design review
- [ ] Manual testing
  - [ ] Windows 7 IE 11
  - [ ] Windows 10 Edge
  - [ ] Mac OS El Capitan Safari
  - [ ] Mac OS El Capitan Chrome
  - [ ] Mac OS El Capitan Firefox
  - [ ] iOS 9 Safari
  - [ ] Android 6 Chrome
  - [ ] Listen to the site on a screen reader
  - [ ] Navigate the site using the keyboard only
- [ ] Tester approved
